pl.polsl.java.project.model

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.project.model.Polynomial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionInterface

    public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionInterface
    Class containing list of coefficient and its power. it represent the equasion. Also class has methodes that creates Points object and adds it to the list.
